name: Dark OP.GG
description: Dark theme for OP.GG (League of Legends / LoL)
additional_info:
05/07/19 - fixed dark theme for nav bar
02/12/19 - fixed dark theme for rank backgrounds
02/08/19 - dark theme for game remake
02/05/19 - fixed dark theme for champion backgrounds
02/04/19 - applied dark theme for rank backgrounds
02/03/19 - adjusted game loss color
02/02/19 - dark theme for urf pages
css:
@-moz-document domain("op.gg") {
.l-wrap--index .l-header,
.l-container,
.l-header,
.l-menu,
.l-wrap--index,
.first-time-user__title,
.first-time-user__content,
.summoner-search-history__title a,
.summoner-search-history__list,
.summoner-search-history__message span,
.ranking-highest__item--big,
.ranking-highest__item,
.ranking-table__header,
.ranking-table__cell,
.ranking-pagination__item--arrow a,
.ranking-pagination__item a,
.ranking-summary--index .ranking-summary-summoner__item,
.MatchBuild .RuneBuild .perk-page-wrap,
.MatchBuild > .SkillBuild > .Content > .SideContent,
.MatchBuild > .SkillBuild > .Content > .RealContent,
.MatchBuild > .ItemBuild > .List,
.modal__title,
.modal,
.modal-footer,
.match-build__title,
.SectionLayoutWrap > .ContentWrap,
.StatisticsFilter > .Header > .Row > .HeaderCell,
.StatisticsFilter > .Content > .Row > .Cell > .ButtonWrap,
.tablesorter > .Header > .Row > .HeaderCell,
.StatisticsChampionTable > .Content > .Row > .Cell,
.ChampionRankingFilterBox > .SearchChampion,
.ChampionRankingFilterBox > .SelectChampion,
.MatchBuild .Title,
.MatchBuild > .ItemBuild > .List > .Item > .Items,
.MatchBuild > .ItemBuild > .List > .Item > .Bar,
.SpectateSummonerList > .Item > .Content,
.SpectateSummonerList > .Item > .Footer > a,
.SpectateSummoner > .Box > .Title,
.SpectateSummoner > .Box > .Content > .Table > .Header > .Row > .HeaderCell,
.SpectateSummoner > .Box > .Content > .Table > .Body > .Row,
.SpectateSummoner > .Box > .Content > .Table > .Body > .Row:nth-child(2n),
.SpectateSummoner .perk-page-wrap,
.perk-page__title-container--popup,
.Box,
.GameAverageStats,
.ChampionWinRatioBox,
.PositionWinRatioBox,
.SummonerRatingMedium > .TierRankInfo,
.SummonerRatingMedium > .Medal > .Image,
.sub-tier,
.SummonersMostGameTable > .Body > .Row.Odd > .Cell,
.SummonersMostGameTable > .Body > .Row > .Cell,
.opscore-banner__header,
.opscore-banner__content,
.opscore-banner__footer,
.opscore-banner__header--button,
.SummonerLayout > .Menu > .MenuList > .Item > a,
.SummonerLayout > .Menu > .MenuList > .Item.inGame > a,
.ChampionBox,
.Box > .Tab > .TabList > .Item,
.perk-page__title-container,
.MatchTeamAnalysisHeader ul,
.MatchDetailLayout .MatchDetailContent > .Content > div,
.ChampionStatsTable > .Body > .Row > .Cell,
.stats-filter,
.stats-filter a,
.ErrorMessage,
.LeagueContainer > .LeagueHeader > .LeagueInfo > .LeagueRankList > .Item > .LeagueRank,
.SummonerLayout > .Menu > .MenuList > .Item.inGame.active > a,
.SpectatorButtons .Button.SemiRound,
.BestGGBox > .Footer,
.SpectatorError,
.SpectatorError h2,
.l-champion-index-content .l-champion-index-content--main,
.champion-index-trend-header,
.champion-index-trend-content,
.champion-index-table__cell,
.champion-index-trend-position__item.active a,
.l-wrap--index .community-best,
.champion-index-trend-position__item a,
.SummonerRatingLine,
.SummonerRatingLine > .TierRank > .Position,
.SummonerRatingMedium > .TierRankInfo > .Position,
.SummonerRatingMedium > .TierRankInfo > .TierInfo > .LeaguePoints,
.SummonerRatingLine > .TierRank > .TierLeaguePoint > .LeaguePoints,
.SummonerRatingMedium > .TierRankInfo > .RankType,
.l-champion-statistics-menu,
.champion-overview__header,
.champion-overview__table,
.champion-overview__sub-header,
.champion-stats-summary-rune__item a,
.champion-box-header,
.champion-box--trend .champion-stats-trend,
.champion-box-content,
.champion-skill-build__table th,
.champion-skill-build__table td,
.champion-stats-summary-ranking__table tr,
.champion-stats__filter__item.active,
.champion-stats__filter__item,
.tablesorter th,
.champion-stats__table__cell,
tr:nth-child(2n) .champion-stats__table__cell,
.l-champion-statistics-header,
.ranking-summary-summoner__item,
.champion-matchup-champion,
.champion-matchup-table th,
td.champion-matchup-data,
.champion-matchup-table td,
.champion-matchup-graph-header,
.champion-matchup-graph-content,
.champion-matchup-sort,
.champion-matchup-champion-list,
.champion-matchup-champion-list__item,
svg:not(:root),
.l-footer,
.l-wrap .gnb .opgg-header__navi,
.l-wrap .gnb .opgg-language,
.l-wrap .gnb .opgg-header__gnb,
.l-wrap .gnb .opgg-language__list,
.l-wrap .gnb .opgg-header__navi-box,
.l-wrap .gnb .opgg-header__logo-anchor,
.gnb-list-item__search .gnb-list-item__select,
.gnb-list-item__search .gnb-list-item__list .gnb-list-item__option{
    background: #101010;
    color: #e5e5e5;
}

.setting__message,
.ranking-highest__item--big .ranking-highest__name,
.ranking-table__cell--summoner span,
.winratio__text,
.ranking-highest__tierrank span,
.ranking-highest__tierrank b,
.ranking-highest__tierrank .ranking-highest__level,
.ranking-summary-champion__label,
.ranking-summary-summoner__name,
.ranking-summary-summoner__gamecount,
.SpectateSummoner > .Box > .Content > .Table > .Body > .Row > .Cell.RuneMastery > .Button,
.first-time-user__item h1,
.footer__copyright,
.footer,
.PageHeaderWrap > .Menu > .MenuList > .Item .Link,
.PageHeaderWrap > .PageDescription > .Text,
.ranking-highest__item a,
.SpectateSummonerList > .Item > .Content > .SummonerName,
.SpectateSummonerList > .Item > .Content > .ChampionName,
.SpectateSummonerList > .Item > .Content > .GameInfo > .GameType,
.SpectateSummonerList > .Item > .Footer > a > .Extra,
.SpectateSummoner > .Box > .Title > small,
.SpectateSummoner > .Box > .Content > .Table > .Body > .Row > .Cell.SummonerName > .SummonerName,
.SpectateSummoner > .Box > .Content > .Table > .Body > .Row > .Cell.CurrentSeasonTierRank,
.perk-page__title-container .perk-page__title,
.GameAverageStats tr > .MostChampion ul li .Name,
.GameAverageStats tr > .PositionStats > ul > li .PositionStatContent .Name,
.GameAverageStats tr > .PositionStats > ul > li .PositionStatContent .WinRatio span,
.GameAverageStats tr > .PositionStats > ul > li .PositionStatContent .WinRatio,
.GameAverageStats tr > .KDA > .KDARatio > .KDARatio,
.GameAverageStats tr > .KDA > .KDA > .Kill,
.GameAverageStats tr > .KDA > .KDA > .Assist,
.GameAverageStats tr > .Summary .WinRatioGraph .Text,
.SummonersMostGameTable > .Body > .Row > .Cell.WinRatio,
.SummonersMostGameTable > .Body > .Row > .Cell.SummonerName > .Link,
.Box > .Title,
.ChampionWinRatioBox > .ChampionInfo > .ChampionName > a,
.SummonerLayout > .Header > .Profile > .Information > .Name,
.GameDetailTable > .Content > .Row > .Cell.SummonerName > .Link,
.GameDetailTable > .Content > .Row > .Cell.CS > .CS,
.GameDetailTable > .Content > .Row > .Cell.CS,
.GameItem > .Content > .KDA > .KDA > .Kill,
.GameItem > .Content > .KDA > .KDA > .Assist,
.GameItem > .Content > .FollowPlayers.Names > .Team > .Summoner > .SummonerName > .Link,
.GameItem > .Content > .GameSettingInfo > .ChampionName > a,
.GameItem > .Content > .KDA > .KDARatio .KDARatio,
.GameItem > .Content > .KDA > .KDARatio,
.GameItem > .Content > .Stats,
.GameItem > .Content > .GameStats > .GameType,
.GameItem > .Content > .GameStats,
.ChampionBox > .ChampionInfo > .ChampionName > a,
.summary-graph > .total--container > .graph--title,
.summary-graph > .total--container > .graph--data__left,
.summary-graph > .total--container > .graph--data__right,
.GameDetailTableWrap > .Summary > .Team > .ObjectScore,
.GameDetailTableWrap > .Summary > .Team > .ObjectScore,
.GameDetailTable > .Header > .Row > .HeaderCell,
.MatchTeamAnalysisHeader ul li a,
.MatchAnalysisListItemContent h4,
.MatchBuild > .SkillBuild > .Content > .RealContent .SkillBuildTable > .Content > .Row > .Cell.Label,
.MatchBuild > .SkillBuild > .Content > .SideContent > .Item > .HotKey,
.MatchBuild > .ItemBuild > .List > .Item > .Time,
.GameDetailTable > .Content > .Row > .Cell.Tier,
.GameDetailTable > .Content > .Row > .Cell.Damage > .ChampionDamage,
.GameDetailTable > .Content > .Row > .Cell.KDA > .KDARatio,
.ChampionStatsTable > .Body > .Row > .Cell.Value,
.ChampionStatsTable > .Body > .Row > .Cell.ChampionName > a,
.LeagueContainer > .LeagueContent .Table > .Content > .Row > .Cell.SummonerName > .Link,
.LeagueContainer > .LeagueContent .Table > .Header > .Row > .HeaderCell,
.LeagueContainer > .LeagueContent .Table > .Content > .Row > .Cell.LP,
.WinRatioGraph > .WinRatio,
.LeagueContainer > .LeagueContent .Table > .Content > .Row > .Cell.Rank,
.LeagueContainer > .LeagueHeader > .LeagueInfo > .LeagueTierRank,
.LeagueContainer > .LeagueHeader > .LeagueInfo > .LeagueName,
.SummonerLayout > .Header > .Profile > .Information > .Team,
.BestGGBox div,
.champion-index-trend-header h2,
.champion-index__champion-item__name,
.champion-index-table__header,
.champion-index-table__name,
.community-best__title,
.StatisticsFilter > .Content > .Row > .Cell > .ButtonWrap > .RadioButton > .Label,
.GameDetailTable > .Content > .Row > .Cell.OPScore > .Text,
.GameItem > .Content > .Items .Trinket,
.GameAverageStats tr > .MostChampion ul li .KDA,
.GameAverageStats tr > .MostChampion ul li .WonLose,
.GameAverageStats tr > .Title,
.sub-tier__rank-type,
.sub-tier__league-point,
.sub-tier__gray-text,
.ChampionBox > .Played > .Played,
.ChampionBox > .Played > .WinRatio,
.champion-overview__header h2,
.champion-overview__stats--pick strong,
.champion-overview__stats--pick span,
.champion-overview__stats--win strong,
.champion-stats-summary-rune__name,
.champion-stats-summary-rune__rate span,
.champion-box-header__title h4,
.champion-box--trend .champion-stats-trend-rate + .champion-stats-trend-average,
.champion-stats-trend-rank span,
.champion-stats-summary-ranking__table__summoner span,
.champion-stats-summary-ranking__table th,
.champion-stats-summary-ranking__table__gamecount b,
.champion-stats-summary-ranking__table__gamecount,
.champion-stats__filter_item_value--winrate b,
.champion-stats__filter__item__value b,
.champion-stats__table__cell--pickrate em,
.champion-stats__single__item span,
.champion-stats-menu__list__item a,
.champion-ranking__title h1,
.ranking-summary-summoner__tierlevel b,
.ranking-summary-summoner__tierlevel,
.ranking-summary-summoner__stats span,
.champion-ranking-table__cell--summoner span,
.champion-ranking-table__cell--tierlevel,
.champion-ranking-table__cell--rank,
.champion-ranking-table__cell--gamecount,
.champion-ranking-table__cell--winratio .winratio__text,
.champion-matchup-list__rank,
.ChampionStatsTable > .Body > .Row > .Cell.KDA > .KDA,
.summoner-search-history__list .Item > a,
.GameItem > .Content > .Stats > .CKRate,
.SpectateSummoner > .Box > .Content > .Table > .Body > .Row > .Cell.RankedWinRatio > .Ratio,
.SpectateSummoner > .Box > .Content > .Table > .Body > .Row > .Cell.RankedWinRatio,
.SpectateSummoner > .Box > .Content > .Table > .Body > .Row > .Cell.ChampionInfo > .WinRatio > .Ratio,
.SpectateSummoner > .Box > .Content > .Table > .Body > .Row > .Cell.ChampionInfo,
.SpectateSummoner > .Box > .Title > small.Time,
.GameDetailTable > .Content > .Row > .Cell.KDA > .KDA,
.GameDetailTable > .Content > .Row > .Cell.Ward,
.GameItem.Remake > .Content > .GameStats > .GameResult {
    color: #e5e5e5;
}

.GameItem > .Content > .FollowPlayers.Names > .Team > .Summoner.Requester > .SummonerName > .Link,
.Row.isRequester,
.GameItem > .Content > .Stats > .MMR b {
    font-weight: bold;
    color: #e5e5e5;
}

.ranking-highest__item {
    border: none;
}

.GameItem.extended.Win > .GameDetail,
.GameItem.extended.Lose > .GameDetail,
.GameDetailTable > .Header,
.GameDetailTable > .Content > .Row > .Cell.Damage > .Progress,
.GameDetailTableWrap > .Summary,
.MatchDetailMatchAnalysis .MatchDetailTeamLegend,
.MatchDetailMatchAnalysis > ul > li,
.MatchDetailMatchAnalysis > ul,
.MatchTeamAnalysisHeader ul li a,
.champion-list-filter {
    background: #101010;
}

.MatchDetailHeader ul li.active a,
.SummonerRatingMedium > .Medal {
    background: #101010 !important;
    color: #e5e5e5;
}

.summoner-search-form__text,
.form-control input,
.form-control select,
.form-control textarea,
.champion-list-filter__keyword input,
.gnb-list-item__search input,
.ranking-pagination__item--disable a,
.PageHeaderWrap > .Menu > .Actions > .SearchItem > .FormItem > .InputText > .Input,
.ChampionRankingFilterBox > .SearchChampion > .SearchChampionForm > .SearchInput,
.PageHeaderWrap > .Menu > .Actions > .Action > .Button,
.GameListContainer > .Header > .Navigation > .Actions > .Action > .ChampionMatchSearchWrap > .Header > .Input,
.SummonerLayout > .Menu > .MenuList > .Item:hover > a,
.SummonerLayout > .Menu > .MenuList > .Item.inGame:hover > a,
.GameListContainer > .Header > .Navigation > .Actions > .Action > .ChampionMatchSearchWrap > .Header,
.GameListContainer > .Header > .Navigation > .Actions > .Action > .ChampionMatchSearchWrap > .Header > .Action,
.SummonerLayout > .Header > .PastRank > .PastRankList > .Item,
.SummonerLayout > .Header > .Profile > .Information > .FavoriteButton,
.Box > .Tab > .TabList > .Item.active,
.ranking-highest__item.ranking-highest__item--big .ranking-highest__rank,
.ranking-highest__item .ranking-highest__rank,
.ranking-summary-summoner__rank,
.ranking-summary-summoner__button,
.StatisticsChampionTable > .Content > .Row.Top > .Cell,
.SpectateSummoner > .Box > .Content > .Table > .Body > .Row > .Cell.RuneMastery > .Button,
.SummonerLayout > .Menu > .MenuList > .Item.active > a,
.MostChampionContent > .MoreButton > .Action,
.community-article__list__item:hover,
.alert__item,
.champion-index-trend-position__item.active a,
.champion-stats-header__tab__item.active a,
.champion-matchup-search input,
.champion-matchup-champion-list__item:hover,
.l-wrap .gnb .opgg-language__item--is-active,
.l-wrap .gnb .opgg-language__item:hover,
.gnb-list-item__search .gnb-list-item__list .gnb-list-item__option:hover{
    background: #202020;
    color: #e5e5e5;
}

.GameDetailTable.Result-LOSE > .Content > .Row.isRequester,
.GameDetailTable.Result-LOSE > .Content > .Row > .Cell,
.GameItem.Lose > .Content,
.GameItem.extended.Lose > .GameDetail .MatchDetailHeader li a,
.WinRatioGraph > .Graph > .Fill.Right {
    background: #642405;
}

.GameDetailTable.Result-WIN > .Content > .Row.isRequester,
.GameDetailTable.Result-WIN > .Content > .Row > .Cell,
.GameItem.Win > .Content,
.GameItem.extended.Win > .GameDetail .MatchDetailHeader li a,
.WinRatioGraph > .Graph > .Fill.Left {
    background: #14a;
}

.GameDetailTable.Result-Remake > .Content > .Row.isRequester,
.GameDetailTable.Result-Remake > .Content > .Row > .Cell,
.GameItem.Remake > .Content,
.GameItem.extended.Remake > .GameDetail .MatchDetailHeader li a,
.GameDetailTable > .Content > .Row > .Cell,
.SummonerRatingMedium {
    background: #101010;
}

.ChampionBox > .PersonalKDA > .KDA.green {
    color: #2daf7f;
}

.ChampionBox > .PersonalKDA > .KDA.blue {
    color: #1f8ecd;
}

.ChampionBox > .PersonalKDA > .KDA.orange {
    color: #e19205;
}

.champion-stats-menu__list__item--red a {
    color: #d0011b;
}
}

@-moz-document domain("talk.op.gg") {
header,
.sub-header__title,
.sub-header-info,
.l-content,
.article-list-item,
.sidebar-content-header,
footer,
.footer-link,
.article-list-paging-content,
.sidebar-menu,
.sidebar-menu__title,
.sidebar-menu__item,
.sub-header-search__select,
.sub-link__list,
.site-family-list__title,
.site-family-list {
    background: #101010;
    color: #e5e5e5;
}

.sidebar-menu__item:hover a,
.article-list-item:hover,
.article-list-paging__button:first-child,
.game-info-search__input,
.sub-header-search__input,
.site-family-list__item:hover a {
    background: #202020;
    color: #e5e5e5;
}

.site-family__name {
    color: #e5e5e5;
}
}

@-moz-document domain("member.op.gg") {
.member-card-layout__container,
.member-card-layout,
.login__fb-login-btn,
.login__fb-title,
.member-input__box,
.select-language__dropdown-btn,
.select-language__item-btn {
    background: #101010;
    color: #e5e5e5;
}

.select-language__dropdown-btn,
.select-language__item-btn {
    border-radius: 0px;
}
}
